metadata.title: CVE-2021-44648 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: GNOME gdk-pixbuf 2.42.6 is vulnerable to a heap-buffer overflow vulnerability when decoding the lzw compressed stream of image data in GIF files with lzw minimum code size equals to 12.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-07-05, proposed fix not commited upstream

criterions.comment: gdk-pixbuf package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-07-05').
